attributes.review:
I cannot complain enough. I downloaded this app hoping to become more educated on the equality-based morals of our 🍊orange✨ president. I was UTTERLY disappointed when I realized THAT information was NO WHeRE to be found!! In fact, i’m starting to think this guy DOESN’T actually care about equality?!?! 🤯 To make things worse, IMMEDIATELY after downloading this app (which took 6 weeks), the president asked for my PHONE NUMBER!!! I thought this was EXTREMELY inappropriate considering that he is a MARRIED MAN!!! I do intend on contacting Melania. And after only listening to news from a single news source that supports Trump✨, I never would have deemed him to be a cheater!!!!??? Anyways, not long after giving him my number, 🍊started BOMBARDING me with texts!! AND weird things started happening. A slurred voice entered my head and started screaming racist and sexist things at me?!?! This voice was accompanied by a blurry orange image in my head, I couldn’t make out what it was but it resembled a face. THEN, TO CONFIRM MY SUSPICION, EVERY FABRIC IN MY HOME TRANSFORMED INTO TRUMP 2020 MERCH!! That was when I knew it was all because of this app. The voice in my head kept trying to convince me to do awful things, it was almost like I was being ✨brainwashed❤️. I managed to compress the horrible urges long enough to keep the people around me safe, and I knew I had to delete the toxic app. BUT, because of the constant propaganda being texted to my phone, I didn’t even notice my notification reminding me to breathe!!!! As you can assume, I passed out. It was very unfortunate that I was standing on top of a building at this point because I was plunged towards the ground as I fell. On the ground I awoke with loved ones by my side. Expecting them to be my last words, I managed to say, “PLEASE, DELETE THE TRUMP 2020 APP! AND VOTE FOR ANYONE ELSE! and also tell Melania he loves me now and not her😿” Of course, by the grace of God, those were not my last words. I am lucky to be alive today. By the time I woke up, my family had deleted the app for me and I haven’t experienced the trauma since. However, I now require expensive and extensive therapy because of the trauma I did endure.
 Please do not get this app unless you wish to experience similar things, or if you’d like to leave a review spreading awareness on experiences like mine.
attributes.title: Traumatizing
